verses.name: Jeremiah 21:1
verses.text: The word which came unto Jeremiah from the Lord, when king Zedekiah sent unto him Pashur the son of Melchiah, and Zephaniah the son of Maaseiah the priest, saying,

verses.name: Jeremiah 21:2
verses.text: Enquire, I pray thee, of the Lord for us; for Nebuchadrezzar king of Babylon maketh war against us; if so be that the Lord will deal with us according to all his wondrous works, that he may go up from us.

verses.name: Jeremiah 21:3
verses.text: Then said Jeremiah unto them, Thus shall ye say to Zedekiah:
